display_long_description:
🏆  Top 50 Best Selling Quest Games of All Time - Meta

⭐️ Featured in "New Games We Love" - Apple Editors

🏆 Winner of Best Updated Game - UploadVR

Waltz of the Wizard is a Reality Experience  — a new form of game where you can do anything in a world where characters can talk to you and have thousands of reactions!



Your journey begins in your magical tower where you combine arcane ingredients into a boiling cauldron with the help of your strange skull assistant, Skully, who you might learn to loathe or learn to love... which one will it be?

[media]
Skully features thousands of voice-acted dialogues and an enormous range of unique reactions. Skully is intensely aware—responding not just to what you say, but also your gaze and gestures.

[media]
Your magic abilities are dazzlingly diverse; summon storms of fireballs, manipulate time, transform objects into frogs, master natural magic particles. 

[media]
Use voice interactions with blazingly fast responsiveness to talk to characters or use voice commands to magically modify anything to your heart's desire. For those who prefer to remain silent there is always the optional Type to Talk.

[media]
Dive into a fantasy world filled with bizarre curiosities, hilarious secrets and many hours of gameplay. Whether you’re navigating Skully’s past memories, hunting for glory in the Observer Fortress, or strapping Skully to some unstable medieval rockets.

[media]
Waltz of the Wizard has greatly expanded with multiple free updates since the original release!
